answerText: David Herbert Lawrence[10] Constance is the title character of this Lawrence novel, in which she has an affair with gamekeeper Oliver Mellors.  It was the subject of some notable obscenity trials.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | RPI | 3 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Elizabeth finds out that her husband Walter died in a coalmine accident in this author's story "Odour of Chrysanthemums." For 10 points each: [10] Name this author who wrote about a boy who can clairvoyantly predict the outcome of horse races in "The Rocking-Horse Winner"
